meanings.definition: To fasten or secure with a knot or string.
meanings.sent1: I will tyin my shoes before going for a walk.

meanings.sent1: She used a tyin to hold the curtains back.
meanings.sent2: The package was wrapped with a colorful tyin.

meanings.definition: The act of securing something with a knot or string.
meanings.sent1: His tyin of the parcel was neat and tidy.
